summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2546 for the improvement of Forty-fourth Avenue Southwest, from West Alaska Street to West Edmonds Street all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, all in accordance with Majority Petition, being File No. 47531, under Ordinance No. 29529, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and fixing a date for the issuance of bonds.
